content.title: Thoracic Endovascular Aortic Repair (TEVAR)
content.description: Endovascular treatment of thoracic aortic pathology using covered stent grafts, with applications in aneurysm, dissection, trauma, and intramural hematoma.

subclavian_coverage.considerations: Left vertebral dominance, prior CABG with LIMA, left arm dialysis access
subclavian_coverage.management: Revascularization (carotid-subclavian bypass or transposition) if risk factors present

spinal_cord_protection.risk_factors: Long coverage, prior AAA repair, LSA coverage, renal insufficiency
